description:
Everyone in Class C has passed their year-end exam. While relief flows through the classroom, Chabashira announces a special exam. It will be a class vote to choose three people worthy of praise and three worthy of censure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aku o Okonau yori mo, Sono Aku ni Kizutsukerareru Hou ga Ii
Es mejor sufrir una injusticia que hacerla.
Il vaut mieux recevoir une injure que de la faire
It Is Better to Receive an Injury Than to Inflict One.
悪を行うよりも, その悪に傷つけられる方が良い
